project.name: C-C831A-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C831A-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive This weakness expects a string in the form: '<file1> <file2> <data>' where file1 and file2 are files that are used to delay execution, and data is a string containing no spaces. A non-rentrant signal handler is registered to multiple signals for certian inputs, causing a double free if invoked multiple times in rapid succession. In order to hit the weakness, file1 and file2 must be controlled by runFifo.py (file1 file2), and the data string must begin with a capital letter. In addition a signal must be sent to the process after it creates a file testData/*.pid.

process.script: if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/preprocess_daemon_script_01.pid") && echo "Killed script."; else echo "Failed: Script PID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
